seniority_level.evidence: 5-6 years experience with advanced responsibilities like designing data platforms, optimizing pipelines, and performance tuning suggests senior level despite no 'Senior' in title

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer with core focus on data pipelines, ETL/ELT processes, and data processing

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both real-time streaming data pipelines and batch data processing, indicating hybrid processing paradigm

leadership_expectation.evidence: Focus on building and maintaining pipelines, collaborating with teams, but no mention of direct reports or team leadership responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS, Azure, and GCP all listed as required skills with equal emphasis, no single cloud dominates

secondary_clouds.evidence: All three major clouds (AWS, Azure, GCP) are already captured as primary, no additional clouds mentioned

processing_paradigm.evidence: Explicitly mentions both 'real-time streaming data pipelines' and 'batch data processing' for high-volume workloads

orchestrator_category.evidence: Apache Airflow explicitly mentioned as required skill for data orchestration

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions both data warehouse solutions (BigQuery, Redshift) and data lake storage (S3, Blob Storage)

remote_restriction.evidence: Onsite requirement in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India - specific regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: India-based position in Bengaluru with onsite requirement, indicating India timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite requirement in Bengaluru suggests candidates need to relocate to or already be in Bengaluru

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and position is in India, suggesting local candidates only

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and onsite India location suggests local work authorization required

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship restrictions mentioned, suggesting work authorization in India is the main requirement

w2_vs_1099.evidence: No employment type or contract information provided in the job posting

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, or compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No career progression, growth opportunities, or advancement paths mentioned in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, working with senior staff, or learning opportunities mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No promotion, advancement, or career progression mentions in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities mentioned

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks, paths, or advancement opportunities mentioned in the job description

requirement_strictness.evidence: Long list of required technical skills with specific experience requirements (5-6 years) and detailed technical specifications

scope_definition.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role with specific responsibilities, technical skills, and clear job scope

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skill requirements (5-6 years, Databricks, cloud platforms, Spark) are reasonable and aligned with senior data engineer expectations
